When you play a non-Ongoing ability, if you control two or more allies of the chosen race, you may copy that ability. (You may choose new targets for the copy.)

name: Rod of Necromancy
effect:
When this weapon enters play, remove all allies in your graveyard from the game.

At the start of your turn, choose an ally removed this way at random and put it into your hand.

name: Rokhan
effect:
As Rokhan enters play, name a card.

Opposing cards in play with that name lose and can't have powers.
"I'll be spearheading dat right away!"

name: Roza the Star-Mother
effect: This ally has +1 / +1 for each resource you control.
Debros and Dayna each inherited a piece of her mother's constitution.

name: Rune of Vengeance
effect:
Attach to target weapon you control. Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game.

Ongoing: Attached weapon has +ATK equal to the ATK of that removed ally.
"It's time for some undeath metal."

name: Runetotem Guardian
effect:
Protector

This ally can't attack.
"Your aggression will not go unpunished."

name: Savage Beatdown
effect: Target ally has +5 ATK and Smash this turn.
"Smash you!"

name: Savage Combat
effect:
Combat Talent

This turn, when your hero deals combat damage to a hero, it also deals that much melee damage to each opposing ally.
"Not having a weapon is never an excuse for letting your target survive."

name: Savage Wrathguard
effect: Smash
"Their skill in battle should never be underestimated." - Exodar Holographic Emitter

name: Scheming Watcher
effect: When this ally enters play, you may draw two cards. If you do, put two cards from your hand on top of your deck in any order.
The draenei have been studying the demons of the Burning Legion for millennia, but some species remain a mystery even to them.

name: Scroll of Town Portal
effect: (1), Destroy this item → Put target ally you control into its owner's hand.
Far more reliable than breadcrumbs or string.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Seres, Timewalker Assassin
effect: When this ally enters play and when she is revealed from your deck, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Shadows from Beyond
effect:
Warp

Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target ally. If fatal damage is dealt this way, its controller chooses and discards a card.

name: Shattered Hand Cutthroat
effect: When this ally attacks, you may exhaust target armor.
"If they have a weakness, I'll find it."

name: Sister of Seduction
effect: When this ally is destroyed, Portal.

name: Sixto the Earth-Blessed
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, you may complete target quest you control without paying its cost.
"The Earthmother has granted me a portion of her power, to use for the good of my people."

name: Smoke Screen
effect: Your hero has Elusive and Spellshield
Theatrics and deception are essential tools in a rogue's arsenal.

name: Snare from Beyond
effect:
Warp

Attach to target ability, ally, or equipment and exhaust it.

Ongoing: Attached card can't ready during it's controller's ready step.

name: Sogoridon the Savage
effect:
Monster Hero Required

This ally has +7 / +7 while an opponent controls a or hero.
"These colossal destroyers serve as the Legion's military commanders. They are as cruel as they are powerful." - Exodar Holographic Emitter

name: Soul Warding
effect:
Discipline Talent

Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally can't be destroyed.
"Evil corrupts not only the body and mind, but the spirit as well."

name: Soulbond
effect:
Attach to target Demon ally.

Ongoing: If your hero would be dealt damage, it's dealt to attached ally instead.
"You'll do as I say, even if it means the death of you."

name: Splintered Thought
effect: Remove the top X cards of target opponent's deck from the game. You may put an ally with cost X or less removed this way into play under your control.
"The strongest of bodies, and yet the weakest of minds." - Orox Darkhorn

name: Spook
effect: Target player puts an ally he controls into its owner's hand.
"Face your fears, I dare you." - Haro Setting-Sun

name: Staff of Silence
effect:
When an opponent plays an ability, add a silence counter to this weapon.

Opponents pay (1) more to play abilities for each silence counter on this weapon.
Silence is golden.

name: Stormwind Recruit
effect: Protector
"I pledge myself to the Service of Stormwind."

name: Sunwalker Lighthorn
effect: "I hope that each passing day brings me one step closer to An'she."

name: Tactical Mastery
effect:
Opposing heroes and allies must attack this turn if able.

When an opponent proposes a combat this turn, you may change the proposed defender. (It must be a legal choice for the attacker.)

name: Tempest Elemental
effect: At the start of your turn, put an ally you control into its owner's hand.
A swirling tempest is but a gust away from a raging tornado.

name: Temporal Shift
effect: Remove target defending ally from combat. It has Elusive this turn.
"Blink and you might miss it."

name: Terror Hound
effect: When this ally enters play, you may switch the ATK and of target ally this turn.
Twice the bark and twice the bite.

name: Terror of the Tides
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, or equipment with cost 3 or more into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"These tracks are fresh, but they split off in opposite directions. Illidan must be getting help from someone." - Maiev Shadowsong

name: Terrorguard Detonator
effect: When this ally enters play, you may destroy another ally you control. If you do, destroy target ally.

name: The Founding of Durotar
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw two cards, then discard a card at random.
After the battle of Mount Hyjal in Kalimdor, Thrall led his orcs south. There he founded Durotar and built the orc stronghold of Orgrimmar.

name: The Invasion of Kalimdor
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, or equipment with cost 3 or less into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"The Demigod has fallen! The Warsong are supreme!" - Grom Hellscream

name: The Scourge of Lordaeron
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Remove all cards in target player's graveyard from the game.
After preparing for many long months, Kel'Thuzad and his Cult of the Damned finally struck the first blow by releasing the plague of undeath upon Lordaeron.

name: The Widow Deadsie
effect: Unity: While you control three or more Human allies, prevent all damage that would be dealt to this ally.
"Perhaps the day will soon come when I can join my lost love."

name: Thunder Hawk
effect: Stealth
"Once I tame him, I will name him Falketto." - Horley the Hunter

name: Thundercrash
effect: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way has -1 ATK this turn.
"Here comes the boom!"

name: Thunderhorn Windwalker
effect: Long-Range
"When danger is near, the wild is often the first to recognize it. You would do well to remember that."

name: Torrid Abyssal
effect: Rougher and more jagged than their Infernal counterparts, these towering constructs burn with red flame instead of green.

name: Torturous Poison
effect:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a poison counter to this ability. Then, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character for each poison counter on this ability.

name: Totem from Beyond
effect:
Warp

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, this Totem deals 2 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally.

name: Track from Beyond
effect:
Warp

Look at the top four cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Unleash the Beasts
effect:
Ongoing: When this ability enters play, reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put any number of revealed Pet and/or Beast allies into play, and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

You can control any number of Pets.

Pet and Beast allies you control have Ferocity and Smash.

name: Valik, Timewalker Sharpshooter
effect: When this ally enters play and when he is revealed from your deck, target friendly ally has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Varimathras, Dreadlord Insurgent
effect:
Monster Hero Required

When Varimathras enters play, Portal.

If you would reveal three cards with a Portal power, reveal six cards instead.
"Vanquish the weak!"

name: Vilegut
effect:
Protector

This ally has +1 / +1 for each ally in opposing graveyards.
With each fallen foe, another piece of flesh is added to this monstrosity.

name: Void Brute
effect: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only this ally if able.
The shadows of the void swirl endlessly where its heart should be.

name: Wand of Mana Stealing
effect: When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, that hero's controller chooses and discards a card and you draw a card.

name: Warden Maiev
effect: Elusive, Ferocity, Long-Range, Protector, Spellshield
"The guilty will suffer."

name: Warsong Deadblade
effect: "The song of battle will never fade."

name: Wild Harmony
effect: Choose one: Your hero deals 4 arcane damage to target hero or ally; or your hero heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
"The gentle rains of the wild will restore those in need. The fury of the stars, however, will not be so kind."

name: Will from Beyond
effect:
Warp

Ongoing: Your hero has +10 and Protector.

name: Winterhoof Frostheart
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, target opposing ally has -1 ATK this turn.
"I gave my life for my people once, and if called upon, I will do so again."

name: Zalekor the Ferocious
effect:
Ferocity

When this ally enters play, Portal.

When a non-token ally enters play under your control, if you didn't play it from your hand, it has Ferocity this turn.
"The Legion has come!"

name: Zealotry
effect:
Retribution Talent

Ongoing: Heroes and weapons you control have Sentinel.

name: Zhar'doom
effect: (1), Remove three ability cards in your graveyard from the game → This ally deals 3 shadow damage to target hero and heals 3 damage from your hero.
The Devourer
